name: Faq elementor addon
author: Quazi Sazzad

sections.description:
faq elementor addon to display nice faq section. It has a very good and unique design.

Featured

  1. Drag And Drop
  2. typography option
  3. color option
  4. easy to use
 Need Support ? Contact Us

How to use:-
very easy to use, install faq and elementor plugin . Then darg and drop faq
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for “faq”. Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, faq Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “faq Plugin” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatable on latest wordpress and elementor version ?

Yes
